about_the_game:
EPIC ZOMBIES - This Game is in Early Access, The Story and Structure are still in Development.

Due to a Lab Accident, Almost everyone on Earth has been turned into a Zombie.

You are the last remaining Human on Earth. Can You Survive?

This is a unique RPG Survival game.

It features all the necessary content needed to provide the Player with the best user and gameplay experience, such as a unique 3D environment, GUI design, and complete survival gameplay mechanics.

The Game is packed with a complete inventory management and crafting system, building system, environmental harvesting, and looting system, A.I., combat mechanics, and many more features provided down below . . .


Features:

Advanced Inventory and Crafting System
Inventory Quickslots
Inventory Extension / Backpack System
Item Durability with Repair Functionality
Vast building and crafting
Building health destruction system alongside repair ability
Auto-Saving System
Loot spawning system
Survival Stats (Health, Hunger, and Thirst)
Environment Harvesting System with respawning (mining, wood cutting, etc.)
Day & Night + Weather System
Holdable Items
Sniper Rifle scoping (zooming) mechanics


Large Map
Lots of Zombies roaming around
Animals to Hunt
